author: craigmcc
msg: Fix the process of undeploying a web applcation (in StandardContext.stop())
so that, if the application is deployed from a WAR file instead of an
unpacked directory, the WAR file is actually closed.  Otherwise, you run into
problems trying to redeploy a WAR file from the same pathname (on Unix, you
see the old webapp again because the old WAR is still open, on Windows you
get errors trying to write onto a WAR file open for reading).

author: craigmcc
msg: Update Ant tasks to URLEncode the query parameters that are sent along with
the commands to the Manager webapp.  This deals with issues like spaces in
the context path, which were not being deployed correctly.
FIXME - The code that maps a request URI to a context still chokes on a
space in the context path; that is the next thing to be fixed.
